content.html: I don’t care? I never optimised anywhere - on Twitter, LinkedIn, my blog, newsletter - for how a supposed algorithm works. I’m sure growth hackers are delighted and rubbing their hands how to generate meaningless but viral content, but I could not care less about growth hacking.
content.value:
I don’t care? I never optimised anywhere - on Twitter, LinkedIn, my blog, newsletter - for how a supposed algorithm works.

I’m sure growth hackers are delighted and rubbing their hands how to generate meaningless but viral content, but I could not care less about growth hacking.
